description: This file provides security utilities for JWT authentication and password hashing, including password hashing with bcrypt and fallback to salted SHA-256, as well as JWT token creation and decoding.

methods.name: _sha256_hex
methods.description: Returns a hex-encoded SHA-256 digest of a string.

methods.name: _bcrypt_safe_transform
methods.description: Prepares passwords for bcrypt hashing, pre-hashing long passwords with SHA-256.

methods.name: _is_sha256_bcrypt_tagged
methods.description: Detects if a hash is tagged as a bcrypt-sha256 format.

methods.name: _wrap_bcrypt
methods.description: Wraps bcrypt hash core with a scheme tag for storage.

methods.name: _unwrap_bcrypt
methods.description: Extracts bcrypt hash from a tagged bcrypt-sha256 string.

methods.name: hash_password
methods.description: Hashes a password securely using bcrypt or fallback to salted SHA-256.

methods.name: verify_password
methods.description: Verifies a password against stored hash supporting multiple schemes.

methods.name: create_access_token
methods.description: Creates a signed JWT access token with optional claims and expiration.

methods.name: decode_token
methods.description: Decodes and validates a JWT token, returning its claims.
